LanguageData.XAngelApparel_ShirtsPants.label: XA shirt and trousers
LanguageData.XAngelApparel_ShirtsPants.description: A type of everyday clothing designed for fallers. The garment is thin and airy.
LanguageData.XAngelApparel_ArmyPants.label: XA Military Trousers
